hooks.command: if command -v just >/dev/null 2>&1; then just --quiet --allow-missing fmt >/dev/null 2>&1 || { echo 'just fmt failed' >&2; exit 1; }; fi
if git rev-parse --git-dir >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo 'Git status:' && git status -s -uall --porcelain && echo ''; else echo 'Git status: Not a git repo'; fi
if git rev-parse --git-dir >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo 'Updating Global tags:' && gtags -i -v; fi

echo 'Running auto formats with `just fmt`'; if command -v just >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo 'Formatting with just fmt:'; just --quiet --allow-missing fmt || { echo 'just fmt failed' >&2; exit 1; }; else echo 'just not found, skipping.'; fi
if git rev-parse --git-dir >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo 'Updating Global tags:' && gtags -i -v; fi
